mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_boxes(k, a, b, v):
    answ = 1
    while a > 0 and b > 0:
        sections = min(k, b + 1)
        nuts_in_box = sections * v
        a -= min(nuts_in_box, a)
        b -= min(k - 1, b)
        answ += 1
    if a > 0:
        answ += a // v + int(a % v != 0)
    return answ
